snippet: “Russen & Deutsche,” an exhibition at the Neues Museum in Berlin, is an ambitious attempt to show how the ties between Russian and German cultures have developed over a thousand years.
abstract: Exhibition Russen & Deutsche at Neues Museum in Berlin attempts to show how ties between Russians and Germans have developed over a thousand years.
lead_paragraph: “Russen & Deutsche,” an exhibition at the Neues Museum in Berlin, is an ambitious attempt to show how the ties between Russian and German cultures have developed over a thousand years.

headline.seo: ‘Russen & Deutsche,’ at Neues Museum in Berlin
headline.main: 2 Countries Caught in History’s Awkward Embrace
headline.print_headline: 2 Countries Caught in History’s Awkward Embrace
